a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif;font-weight:500

text.tspan: Primary energy mix in the United Kingdom
Primary energy mix in the United Kingdom, differentiated by energy source. This is based on domestic inland
consumption, and does not include exported energy.
Data source: Digest of UK Energy Statistics (DUKES, 2018)
